feed.title: A blog by Ye Zhengnan
feed.subtitle: 真希望我能写好多好博客

entry.title: Cloudflare outage on November 18, 2025
entry.summary:
For the original text, please refer to Cloudflare outage on November 18, 2025 (link above). You can switch languages using the menu in the upper-right corner to view the translation.

This is an unofficial Chinese translation provided for reference only. Please refer to the official Cloudflare text for accuracy. All rights to the original content belong to Cloudflare.

原文请参考 Cloudflare outage on November 18, 2025。点击右上角切换语言可查看翻译。

本文为非官方中文翻译，仅供参考，请以 Cloudflare 官方原文为准。 译文仅供参考，如与原文存在歧义或差异，以原文为准。译者不对因译文使用产生的任何法律责任承担直接责任。 原文版权归 Cloudflare 所有。

entry.title: Markdown Formatting Test
entry.summary: This page demonstrates various Markdown formatting features that can be used in the theme. The following sections showcase different elements, such as blockquotes, headings, lists, and more.

entry.title: Table of Contents Test
entry.summary: This page demonstrates the table of contents feature with a mix of heading levels, inline links, and nested elements.

entry.title: Code Example
entry.summary: Have code snippets complete with clipboard functionality and fancy language tags. No more boring code snippets in your pages. Oh yeah baby! Click on this article to see some code in action.

entry.title: LaTeX Example
entry.summary: This theme allows you to use MathJax directly in your Markdown! Click on this article to see some fancy math in action. Little teaser: $$ x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a} $$
